Name: Tuxedo Affumicato
Ingredients: 40 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and a mist of Liquore Strega from an atomizer over drink.
Review: Mezcal lends a lightly smoky note to this riff on the classic Tuxedo. This boozy Martini-esque cocktail makes for a great aperitif.
History: Created in 2016 by Riccardo Aletta (AKA 'Ricky D Wing') at Holy Birds in London, England. See: Tuxedo cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Tuxedo Affumicato contains 136 calories
